actions.abilityText:
Single use.

If your opponent has a goop buff card in their discard pile, this attack gains
+5[ATK].
~SINGLE~

Recoil X[ATK], where X is the number of buff slots used with this attack.

For each used buff slot, the enemy monster gains
{"stat": "SPD", "num": 1, "isPositive": false}.
If the enemy monster's
[SPD][NQ]
is at max, the enemy monster gains
{"stat": "ATK", "num": 1, "isPositive": false}
instead.
You may exchange a card from your discard pile with a card from your hand, excluding any cards played with this attack.

buffs.buffText:
Goop. This attack gains
+X+1[ATK],
where X is the number of goop cards in your opponent's discard pile. Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.~GOOP~
buffs.flipEventText:

{"stat": "SPD", "num": 1, "isPositive": false}.
If you do, this monster gains
+2[DEF]
this turn.

promiseDescription: Drive your opponent crazy by loading their deck with a bunch of painfully useless goop!
